title: Client Error
body: For the pas ahour this issue has been occuring, I reinstalled all of league twice, the second time it worked, when I was switching my account, this issues occured again, its also happening to other people, what's going on?

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me! Hopefully they fix it soon

There was an issue with patching for some players.  We had an update posted here on the boards as well as the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything should be okay now!
